text: The 2004 Asian Cycling Championships took place at the Yokkaichi Keirin Velodrome, Yokkaichi, Japan from 9 to 16 April 2004. ==Medal summary== ===Road=== ====Men==== {| |- |Individual road race | | | |- |Individual time trial | | | |} ====Women==== {| |- |Individual road race | | | |- |Individual time trial | | | |} ===Track=== ====Men==== {| |- |Sprint | | | |- |1 km time trial | | | |- |Keirin | | | |- |Individual pursuit | | | |- |Points race | | | |- |Scratch | | | |- |Madison | Shi Guijun Wang Guozhang | Taiji Nishitani Kazuhiro Mori | Choi Dae-yong Lee Hyun-gu |- |Team sprint | Keiichiro Yaguchi Masaki Inoue Keiichi Omori |valign=top| |valign=top| Choi Jeong-wook Jeon Yeong-gyu |- |Team pursuit | Choi Dae-yong Song Kyung-bang Park Seon-ho Lee Hyun-gu | Mehdi Sohrabi Amir Zargari Hossein Askari Alireza Haghi | Kei Uchida Taiji Nishitani Yusuke Kuroki Kazuhiro Mori |} ====Women==== {| |- |Sprint | | | |- |500 m time trial | | | |- |Keirin | | | |- |Individual pursuit | | | |- |Points race | | | |- |Team sprint |valign=top| | Maya Tachikawa Tomoko Endo |valign=top| |} ==Medal table== ==External links== * Official website * Results Asia Asia Cycling Category:Asian Cycling Championships Category:International cycle races hosted by Japan
title: 2004 Asian Cycling Championships
